str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To expect eagerly, wait for eagerly, look for. From apo and ekdechomai; to expect fully.
Eager expectation. From a comparative of apo and a compound of kara and dokeo; intense anticipation.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
An unveiling, uncovering, revealing, revelation. From apokalupto; disclosure.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A son, descendent. Apparently a primary word; a 'son', used very widely of immediate, remote or figuratively, kinship.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
